+/**
+ * @test
+ * @bug 8376491
+ * @summary Regression test for -XX:+UseZGC -XX:ConcGCThreads=11111210 crash
+ * @requires vm.gc.Z
+ * @library /test/lib
+ * @run driver gc.z.TestZValueStorageAlloc
+ */
+
+package gc.z;
+
+import jdk.test.lib.process.OutputAnalyzer;
+import jdk.test.lib.process.ProcessTools;
+
+public class TestZValueStorageAlloc {
+
+    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception{
+        OutputAnalyzer output = ProcessTools.executeTestJava("-XX:+UseZGC",
+                                                             "-XX:ConcGCThreads=11111210",
+                                                             "-version");
+        output.shouldNotContain("# A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment");
+    }
+}
